properties.name: id
properties.description: Should be a unique name for the element

properties.name: is-enabled
properties.description: Does the element respond to update events

properties.name: is-visible
properties.description: Is the element drawn to the screen

properties.name: has-focus
properties.description: Does the element have the focus

properties.name: x
properties.description: The x coordinate in screen coordinates

properties.name: y
properties.description: The y coordinate in screen coordinates

properties.name: z
properties.description: The depth of the element when drawn

properties.name: width
properties.description: The width of the element in screen pixels

properties.name: height
properties.description: The width of the element in screen pixels

properties.name: rotation
properties.description: The rotation of the element in degrees counter-clockwise

properties.name: text
properties.description: The text to display over the element

properties.name: alignment
properties.description: The alignment of the origin of the element (the relative (0, 0) position)

properties.name: text-alignment
properties.description: The alignment of the text within the element

properties.name: color
properties.description: The color tinting of the element

properties.name: color-hover
properties.description: The color tinting of the element when it is being hovered over

properties.name: color-select
properties.description: The color tinting of the element when it is being selected

properties.name: color-text
properties.description: The color of the text

properties.name: icon
properties.description: The name of the texture of the icon to be drawn over the main texture

properties.name: texture
properties.description: The name of the main texture of the element that is drawn while in a neutral state

properties.name: texture-hover
properties.description: The name of the texture of the element that is drawn while in a hover state

properties.name: texture-select
properties.description: The name of the texture of the element that is drawn while in a selected state

properties.name: font
properties.description: The name of the font to draw the text with

properties.name: on-hover-start
properties.description: The event name that is to be called when the element is hovered over

properties.name: on-hover-end
properties.description: The event name that is to be called when the element ceases to be hovered over

properties.name: on-select-start
properties.description: The event name that is to be called when the element is selected

properties.name: on-select-end
properties.description: The event name that is to be called when the element ceases to be selected

properties.name: on-drag-start
properties.description: The event name that is to be called when the element is dragged

properties.name: on-drag-end
properties.description: The event name that is to be called when the element ceases to be dragged

properties.name: transition-on-select
properties.description: The name of the page to transition to when this element is selected

properties.name: children
properties.description: A list of elements that consider this element to be their root

properties.name: color-drag
properties.description: The color tinting of the element while it is in a dragging state

properties.name: use-icon
properties.description: Should the drag image include the icon

properties.name: use-background
properties.description: Should the drag image include the main texture

properties.name: use-text
properties.description: Should the drag image include the text

properties.name: center-on-mouse
properties.description: Should the drag image center it's relative (0, 0) on the mouse position

properties.name: move-on-drag
properties.description: Should this element move while it is being dragged

properties.name: snap-to-x
properties.description: Should the dragging be limited only to the x-axis

properties.name: snap-to-y
properties.description: Should the dragging be limited only to the y-axis

properties.name: min-x
properties.description: The minimum parent-relative x-coordinate that dragging snaps to

properties.name: max-x
properties.description: The maximum parent-relative x-coordinate that dragging snaps to

properties.name: min-y
properties.description: The minimum parent-relative y-coordinate that dragging snaps to

properties.name: max-y
properties.description: The maximum parent-relative y-coordinate that dragging snaps to

properties.name: row
properties.description: The number of rows the grid contains (-1 goes to infinity)

properties.name: column
properties.description: The number of columns the grid contains (-1 goes to infinity)

properties.name: padding
properties.description: The padding (left/right/top/bottom) between the elements in the grid

properties.name: padding-left
properties.description: The left-side padding between the elements in the grid

properties.name: padding-right
properties.description: The right-side padding between the elements in the grid

properties.name: padding-top
properties.description: The top-side padding between the elements in the grid

properties.name: padding-bottom
properties.description: The bottom-side padding between the elements in the grid

properties.name: horizontal
properties.description: Should the horizontal scroll bar be enabled and visible

properties.name: horizontal-flip
properties.description: Should the horizontal scroll bar be displayed at the top of the scroll element

properties.name: vertical
properties.description: Should the vertical scroll bar be enabled and visible

properties.name: vertical-flip
properties.description: Should the vertical scroll bar be displayed at the left side of the scroll element

properties.name: padding
properties.description: The padding (left/right/top/bottom) from the edge of the scroll window to the elements

properties.name: padding-left
properties.description: The left-side padding from the edge of the scroll window to the elements

properties.name: padding-right
properties.description: The right-side padding from the edge of the scroll window to the elements

properties.name: padding-top
properties.description: The top-side padding from the edge of the scroll window to the elements

properties.name: padding-bottom
properties.description: The bottom-side padding from the edge of the scroll window to the elements
